function.name: deviceState_getRemainingTime
function.description: This function is used to query the remaining time for a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to query the remaining time.

groupAction.description: The group action to query the remaining time.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to query the remaining time.
